nl.esciencecenter.esight.textures

Class ByteBufferTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.textures.Texture
      • nl.esciencecenter.esight.textures.Texture2D
        • nl.esciencecenter.esight.textures.ByteBufferTexture

  • public class ByteBufferTexture
extends Texture2D
    Generic wrapper for a Texture made out of a pre-generated ByteBuffer.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ByteBufferTexture(int glMultitexUnit, java.nio.ByteBuffer pixelBuffer, int width, int height)
      Default constructor, wrapper for a pre-generated ByteBuffer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ByteBufferTexture

        public ByteBufferTexture(int glMultitexUnit,
                 java.nio.ByteBuffer pixelBuffer,
                 int width,
                 int height)
        Default constructor, wrapper for a pre-generated ByteBuffer. Do not forget to call Texture2D.init(javax.media.opengl.GL3) before use.
        Parameters:
        glMultitexUnit - The OpenGL-internal MultitexUnit (GL.GL_TEXTUREX) this texture uses.
        pixelBuffer - The pre-generated ByteBuffer holding the pixels.
        width - The width of this texture.
        height - The height of this texture.
